lines.text: I know I'm dumb! But it's all I have to work with.
Remember, the Spanish word for "no" is "no".
You know my work is here.
Well then let me stay here and help you with the money for your clinic.
You know I can't do that.
Well, that's that. The most beautiful two days in my whole life wasted on a fine, decent, stubborn, pigheaded, beautiful, dumb cluck like you.
